title: Guided Studies
requirements: For students in MPhil Medical Sciences
description: To attend seminars/workshops and carry out assignments for the purposes of increasing knowledge of the research area and improving experimental design and data analysis.
outcome: Acquire advanced knowledge in major areas of an academic discipline while maintaining a broad understanding of other related fields.
syllabus: In this course, a student is required to meet with his/her supervisor regularly who provides necessary guidance and supervision to write up a thesis and monitors the student’s academic progress.
required_readings: Please refer to the supervisor's guidance.

title: Seminar
requirements: For students in MPhil Medical Sciences
description: To present a seminar summarizing research work performed in the previous term/year.
outcome: Gain proficiency in techniques of knowledge dissemination through presentation.

title: Research
requirements: For students in MPhil Medical Sciences
description: To conduct research work on the assigned research topic.
outcome: Acquire advanced knowledge in major areas of an academic discipline. Develop the ability to formulate individual research tasks and to develop solution methodologies under minimal supervision. Gain proficiency in techniques of knowledge dissemination through manuscript writing.
syllabus: The programme is research-oriented. It will involve a prescribed series of investigations and students should inform themselves in depth about the fields of knowledge relevant to the topic of their projects.

title: Research
requirements: For students in PhD Medical Sciences
description: To conduct research work on the assigned research topic.
outcome: Acquire advanced knowledge in major areas of an academic discipline. Gain enough background knowledge to enable them to perform research with minimal supervision. Develop the ability to formulate individual research tasks and to develop solution methodologies under minimal supervision.
syllabus: The programme is research-oriented. It will involve a prescribed series of investigations and students should inform themselves in depth about the fields of knowledge relevant to the topic of their projects.

title: Research
requirements: For students in PhD Medical Sciences
description: To conduct research work on the assigned research topic.
outcome: Gain enough background knowledge to enable them to perform research with minimal supervision. Develop the ability to formulate individual research tasks and to develop solution methodologies under minimal supervision. Gain proficiency in techniques of knowledge dissemination through manuscript writing.
syllabus: The programme is research-oriented. It will involve a prescribed series of investigations and students should inform themselves in depth about the fields of knowledge relevant to the topic of their projects.
